scenario_text.value:
Labramon? Why are you running your nose
against the ground like that?

I’m searching for food with my sense of
smell!
Hey, that’s a good idea! Let me try that too!

Agumon’s nose isn’t as good as mine, so he
can’t search like I can!
Not that I’ve found anything either...

Well, let’s keep looking until we find
something!

I’m going to keep looking until I find some
food too!
